summary: Pack of lore-friendly/medieval hairstyles for those who want to save true skyrim game atmosphere.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Trebuchet MS][center][color=#00ffff][size=3](english is not my native language, sorry for any of my literral errors)[/size][/color][/center]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[center][color=#00ff00][size=4]Hi guys![/size][/color]
So where should i start? There is a few hair mods for skyrim that adds a lot of hairstyles. Like ks hairdos or apachii sky hair. But these hairstyles doesn't look natural in skyrim. Because most of these has been converted from the sims and looks too modern and too glossy for skyrim atmosphere. But also there is a couple lore-friendly hair mods like lovely hairstyles, ponytail hairstyles v3_0 and vanilla hair variety plus. And these packs looks really good in game but contains much less hairstyles than ks or apachii. Don't get me wrong, apachii and ks hairs looks great, but not for usual skyrim atmosphere. So i decided to make my own hairstyles pack and it's aimed at lore-friendly and medieval look. There will be no anime or cartoon or modern hairs. All meshes was created by me in autodesk 3d studio max except for couple elements like braids. Hairstyles use vanilla textures so it makes my mod compatible with any vanilla hair retexture mods.[/center]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In current version (1.0.4) pack contains:

[/font][list]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#00ff00]8[/color] unique hairstyles for females wich have variations. In total with variations it'll be [color=#00ff00]11[/color] hairstyles for females.[/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#00ff00]4[/color] unique hairstyle for males with variations. In total [color=#00ff00]6[/color].[/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#00ff00]2[/color] unique unisex hairstyles with variations. In total [color=#00ff00]3[/color] unisex hairstyles.[/font]
[/list]
[font=Trebuchet MS]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Installation: 

[list]
[*]Drop .esp file and meshes folder into your skyrim data folder.
[/list]
Uninstallation:

[list]
[*]Remove [color=#00ff00]TD18_LoreStyleHairstyles.esp[/color] from your skyrim data folder
[*]Remove [color=#00ff00]td18hair[/color] folder from your skyrim meshes folder
[/list]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

F.A.Q: 

[color=#00ffff]Q[/color]: Will you make more hairstyles?
[color=#00ff00]A[/color]: Yes i will. I have a lot of ideas about medieval hairstyles. But 3d modelling is really time-consuming thing.

[color=#00ffff]Q[/color]: Will it work with vanilla hair retexture mods?
[color=#00ff00]A[/color]: Probably. Doesn't test it by myself. But it use same texture UV's so should be no problems. 

[color=#00ffff]Q[/color]: Can i use your hairstyles on my follower mod?
[color=#00ff00]A[/color]: Yes you can but please specify author (me) in description.

[color=#00ffff]Q[/color]: Why did you make monk hair for females? o_O
[color=#00ff00]A[/color]: Just because i can.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Bugs/Issues:

[/font][list]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]Hairs may have clip with armor and body. And this is normal because it was maked for standart cbbe body shape. It cannot be fixed.[/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]Hairs may disappear when you wear a headwear. For now i don't know how to fix it.[/font]
[/list][font=Trebuchet MS]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Updates:

[list]
[*]23/05/18 - ver 1.0.4 - Added elves and orcs compatibility. Added 1 new hair for females and 3 new hairs for males with variations.
[/list]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=4]Special thanks to:

[/size][/font][list]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][url=https://www.bethesda.net]Bethesda[/url]﻿ for such an awesome game[/size][/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686]Caliente[/url]﻿ for beautiful body meshes and bodyslide[/size][/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/about/staff]The Nexus Mods Team[/url]﻿ for this site and for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/modmanager/]Mod Organizer[/url]﻿[/size][/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4]All modmakers for your time and your effort.[/size][/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4]All users for your positive feedbacks.[/size][/font]
[/list]
author: TheDalbak18 - Threeton
